Class JacksonSerializationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.data.jackson.JacksonSerializationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SerializationProvider
    @Deprecated
public final class JacksonSerializationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SerializationProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use JacksonSerializerFactory.
    SerializationProvider implementation using jackson.
